verses.verse: He that <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> place of the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High<s%> shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
I will <S%H559>say<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> He is my <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress:<s%> my <S%H430>God;<s%> in him will I <S%H982>trust.<s%>
<S%H3588>Surely<s%> he shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from the <S%H6341>snare<s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler,<s%> and from the <S%H1942>noisome<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

He shall <S%H5526>cover<s%> you with his <S%H84>feathers,<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3671>wings<s%> shall you <S%H2620>trust:<s%> his <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be your <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H5507>buckler.<s%>
You shall not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> for the <S%H6343>terror<s%> by <S%H3915>night;<s%> nor for the <S%H2671>arrow<s%> that <S%H5774>flies<s%> by <S%H3119>day;<s%>
Nor for the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> that <S%H1980>walks<s%> in <S%H652>darkness;<s%> nor for the <S%H6986>destruction<s%> that <S%H7736>wastes<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday.<s%>

A <S%H505>thousand<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> at your <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousand<s%> at your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand;<s%> but it shall not <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> you.
<S%H7535>Only<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall you <S%H5027>behold<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8011>reward<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which is my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> even the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High,<s%> your <S%H4583>habitation;<s%>
There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H579>befall<s%> you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H5061>plague<s%> <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> your <S%H168>dwelling.<s%>
For he shall give his <S%H4397>angels<s%> <S%H6680>charge<s%> over you, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
They shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> you up in their <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H5062>dash<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> against a <S%H68>stone.<s%>

You shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> on the <S%H7826>lion<s%> and <S%H6620>adder:<s%> the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> and the <S%H8577>dragon<s%> shall you <S%H7429>trample<s%> under <S%H6471>feet.<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> he has set his <S%H2836>love<s%> on me, therefore will I <S%H6403>deliver<s%> him: I will set him on <S%H7682>high,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H8034>name.<s%>
He shall <S%H7121>call<s%> on me, and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him: I will be with him in <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> I will <S%H2502>deliver<s%> him, and <S%H3519>honor<s%> him.
With <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H3117>life<s%> will I <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> him, and <S%H7200>show<s%> him my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
